text: Creating a gin specifically designed for cocktails is only one part of the Fords Gin mission, which aims to support the bartenders redefining the future of hospitality—Let’s shine a light on these game-changers. First up, the remarkable Ashtin Berry! https://t.co/owHgzr86UH

Huge news!!!
Fords Gin Officers’ Reserve has been featured in the September/October issue of @imbibe!!! 😲 
With the release of Fords Gin Officers Reserve so near, we are thrilled to get love from such a legendary publication.
We can’t wait to share the delicious gin inside!

Spotted in the wild at the Fords Gin Botanical Garden last week at the @the1rooftop. 
No garden gnomes, but perhaps an elephant with impeccable taste in gin. 📷 @thelouiscollection
